feature1.title: Accurate Engineering Calculations
feature1.description: Reliable and precise results based on industry-standard formulas and best practices.

feature2.title: Supports 5 Water Treatment Modules

feature3.title: Automatic Report Generation

modules.title: XLNC Modules
modules.subtitle: Powerful, intuitive modules for every stage of your water treatment engineering project.

module1.title: Pipe Sizing
module1.description: Calculate optimal pipe diameters for various flow rates and materials.

module2.title: Spray Aeration
module2.description: Design effective aeration systems for gas exchange and purification.

module3.title: Mixing Reaction
module3.description: Model and size chemical mixing tanks for efficient reactions.

module4.title: Settling Tank
module4.description: Engineer sedimentation basins for effective solids removal.

module5.title: Filtration
module5.description: Design media filters for removing suspended particles from water.

resources.title: Engineering Resources
resources.subtitle: Access a suite of tools and data to support your engineering decisions.

resource1.title: Technical Calculators
resource1.description: Quick calculations for common engineering tasks.

resource2.title: Water Quality Standards
resource2.description: Reference key regulatory water quality parameters.

resource3.title: Chemical Dosing Guide
resource3.description: Guidelines for common water treatment chemicals.

resource4.title: Flow/Velocity Charts
resource4.description: Handy charts for pipe flow and velocity analysis.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose XLNC?
whyChoose.subtitle: XLNC provides a robust, user-friendly platform designed by engineers, for engineers. We streamline your workflow so you can focus on what matters most: delivering excellent results.

benefit1.title: Accuracy You Can Trust
benefit1.description: Our calculations are rigorously tested and validated against established engineering principles.

benefit2.title: Intuitive & Usable Interface
benefit2.description: A clean, logical interface that reduces learning curves and maximizes productivity.

benefit3.title: Unwavering Reliability
benefit3.description: Built on a secure and stable platform to ensure your work is always safe and accessible.

module1.title: Module 1: Pipeline Hydraulics Calculator
module1.description: Calculate pipe diameters, flow velocities, head losses, and required pump heads according to TCVN 33-2006.

module2.title: Module 2: Spray Aeration Calculator
module2.description: Calculate saturated oxygen, required oxygen amount and spray efficiency according to TCVN 7222:2002.

module3.title: Module 3: Mixing Reaction Calculator
module3.description: Calculate mixing tank volume, reaction rate, and oxidation efficiency according to TCVN 7222:2002.

module4.title: Module 4: Settling Tank Calculator
module4.description: Calculate area, volume and settling efficiency according to TCVN 7222:2002, TCVN 33-2006.

module5.title: Module 5: Filtration Calculator
module5.description: Calculate filter area, tank diameter and layer heights according to TCVN 33-2006.
